title: Chilli con carne by joe
ingredients: ['500g steak mince', '2 onions', '2 sticks of celery', '3 cloves of garlic', '2 peppers', '2 tsp hot chilli powder', '1 tsp cumin', '1 tsp paprika', 'salt & pepper', '1 tin butter beans', '1 tin kidney beans', '2 tins chopped tomatoes', '2 beef stock cubes', 'balsamic vinegar', 'Worcester sauce']
